alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:59PM CDT until August 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HANSFORD AND EASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Gruver, or 19 miles west of Spearman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Hansford and eastern Sherman Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
